1101100100100010 0101000000101011 1 -> sum: 0010100101001110, cout: 1
0001000111101100 1001010001000111 1 -> sum: 1010011000110100, cout: 0
1010001010001110 1111001010001001 1 -> sum: 1001010100011000, cout: 1
1101011111101001 1000101100010010 1 -> sum: 0110001011111100, cout: 1
0001011111101111 1000000000100101 1 -> sum: 1001100000010101, cout: 0
0000000010101001 0111111110101010 1 -> sum: 1000000001010100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
